item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "This life is for loving, sharing, learning, smiling, caring, forgiving, laughing, hugging, helping, dancing, wondering, healing, and even more loving. I choose to live life this way. I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!" -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "I would rather make mistakes in kindness and compassion than work miracles in unkindness and hardness." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Roy Disney
item.description: "It's not hard to make decisions when you know what your values are." -- Roy Disney

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Hannah Harrington
item.description: "Whatever you decide, don't let it be because you don't think you have a choice." -- Hannah Harrington

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "It only takes a split second to smile and forget, yet to someone that needed it, it can last a lifetime." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Sometimes it's the same moments that take your breath away that breathe purpose and love back into your life." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Catherine Fisher
item.description: "All my years to this moment All my roads to this wall. All my words to this silence All my pride to this fall. -Songs of Sapphique" -- Catherine Fisher

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by David Foster Wallace
item.description: "The really important kind of freedom involves attention, and awareness, and discipline, and effort, and being able truly to care about other people and to sacrifice for them, over and over, in myriad petty little unsexy ways, every day." -- David Foster Wallace

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I’m here. I love you. I don’t care if you need to stay up crying all night long, I will stay with you. There’s nothing you can ever do to lose my love. I will protect you until you die, and after your death I will still protect you. I am stronger than Depression and I am braver than Loneliness and nothing will ever exhaust me." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Deb Caletti
item.description: "That's what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you're not so lovable." -- Deb Caletti

item.title: Lextacy add a quote by Trenton Lee Stewart
item.description: "You must remember, family is often born of blood, but it doesn't depend on blood. Nor is it exclusive of friendship. Family members can be your best friends, you know. And best friends, whether or not they are related to you, can be your family." -- Trenton Lee Stewart
